decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 91206-01 Plans As Existing; 91206-02 Elevations As Existing; 91206-03 Proposed Plans; 91206-04 Proposed Elevations; 91206-03 Location and Block Plan; Design and Access Statement (Ref: EDWARDS 91206); Email from Eden Verandas dated 09.04.2024 supplementing the installation details
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be identical to what stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Installation of glass canopy to rear elevation on ground floor
